value.name: Anthony McClain's family continues fight for justice
value.description: The family of Anthony McClain, a Black man who was shot in the back by police in Pasadena, California, last August, held a rally Monday to demand accountability in the case. The rally included appearances by civil rights attorney Ben Crump and the family of George Floyd.

video.name: Anthony McClain's family continues fight for justice

value.name: Anthony McClain's family demands justice
value.description: The family of Anthony McClain, a Black man who was shot in the back by police in Pasadena, California, last August, is holding a rally on Monday night to demand accountability. The rally will include appearances by civil rights attorney Ben Crump and the family of George Floyd.

value.name: Family Of George Floyd Joins Family Of Anthony McClain, Of Pasadena, Who Was Killed In Officer-Involved Shooting
value.description: The father-of-three was shot in the back while running from officers in Pasadena in August 2020 after a car where he was a passenger was pulled over for a missing license plate.

video.name: Rally To Demand Police Accountability In Shooting Death Of Anthony McClain

value.name: Attorney for Anthony McClain Demand Justice in Pasadena Police Shooting
value.description: George Floyd family attorney, Benjamin Crump, Anthony McClain, and co-counsel, Caree Harper, led a rally in front of Pasadena City Hall on Monday.  Family members of McClain were joined by two of George Floyd’s brothers in demanding justice in the shooting of McClain who was shot last summer by a Pasadena police officer.

value.name: Attorneys and Families for George Floyd, Anthony McClain Demand Officer Firings and Arrests in Fatal Shooting
value.description: George Floyd family attorney Benjamin Crump led a rally at Pasadena City Hall Monday with two of Floyd’s brothers, family members including children of Anthony McClain, and co-counsel Caree Harper to demand the firing and arrests of the police officers involved in the shooting death of McClain last summer.
